## Query.getPayflowLinkToken property

Retrieve payment credentials for transaction. Use this query for Payflow Link and Payments Advanced payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPayflowLinkToken?: Maybe<PayflowLinkToken>;
```
